argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ixxssixx.1 | |- O = ( x e. RR* , y e. RR* |-> { z e. RR* | ( x R z /\ z S y ) } ) |
| 2 |  | ixxss2.2 | |- P = ( x e. RR* , y e. RR* |-> { z e. RR* | ( x R z /\ z T y ) } ) |
| 3 |  | ixxss2.3 | |- ( ( w e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ C e. RR* ) -> ( ( w T B /\ B W C ) -> w S C ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_elixx3g | |- ( w e. ( A P B ) <-> ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ w e. RR* ) /\ ( A R w /\ w T B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbi | |- ( w e. ( A P B ) -> ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ w e. RR* ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ w e. RR* ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simp3d | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> w e. RR* ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_simprbi | |- ( w e. ( A P B ) -> ( A R w /\ w T B ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> ( A R w /\ w T B ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> A R w ) |
| 11 | 9 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> w T B ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> B W C ) |
| 13 | 6 | #P_simp2d | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> B e. RR* ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> C e. RR* ) |
| 15 | 7, 13, 14, 3 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> ( ( w T B /\ B W C ) -> w S C ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 12, 15 | #P_mp2and | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> w S C ) |
| 17 | 6 | #P_simp1d | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> A e. RR* ) |
| 18 | 1 | #P_elixx1 | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ C e. RR* ) -> ( w e. ( A O C ) <-> ( w e. RR* /\ A R w /\ w S C ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 14, 18 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> ( w e. ( A O C ) <-> ( w e. RR* /\ A R w /\ w S C ) ) ) |
| 20 | 7, 10, 16, 19 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) /\ w e. ( A P B ) ) -> w e. ( A O C ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_ex | |- ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) -> ( w e. ( A P B ) -> w e. ( A O C ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_ssrdv | |- ( ( C e. RR* /\ B W C ) -> ( A P B ) C_ ( A O C ) ) |
\
 Subset relationship for intervals of extended reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
